Title: Exempts IRAs and Roth IRAs in the calculation of household benefits under public assistance programs
Summary: Exempts IRAs and Roth IRAs in the calculation of household benefits under public assistance programs.
LawCode: Amd ยง131-n, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to exempting IRAs and Roth IRAs in the calculation of household benefits under public assistance programs
